title: One bed flat for rent in Camberwell
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


A recently refurbished second floor one bedroom flat close to parks, shops, and transport links.
Lift.
Gated compound.
Lots of storage.
Dual aspect windows in living area.
Two minutes walk from Minet Park.
Video entry system via supplied iPad Mini.
Parking available at £30 pcm.
Fully integrated appliances.
Short walk to transport links via Oval, Denmark Hill, and Loughborough Junction Stations.
Rent: £1,390 pcm plus £65 for heating and hot water.
